drones

Class Drone

  • java.lang.Object
    • drones.Sprite
      • drones.Drone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomDrone, SquareDrone

    public abstract class Drone
extends Sprite
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Basic drone class for creating drones on top of it.

      • scan

        public final boolean scan(java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double e,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Scans the front of the drone, if the ellipse is on the front returns true; if not returns false.
        Parameters:
        e - The ellipse that will be tested
        width - The width of the board
        height - The height of the board
        Returns:
        true if the ellipse is in front of the drone, false if not.
